WMAQ - Broadcasting in Chicago, 1921-1989 - Lights Out, Everybody!

infos.info: Hickerson reports that the program was broadcast on WENR, Chicago, 1934-1935. Length of program was 15 minutes and 30 minutes as of 4/25/34. The revival of Lights Out in 1971-1972 was known as The Devil and Mr. O.
